name: Space Dance (itch) (indiegaga)
description:
Hi,

I started this game in august 2022 when I had some free time, it's a mix of some games I enjoyed and I wanted to prove that we can create an enjoyable game using free assets out there with a bit of discipline and creativity.

The game is a story of a girl fighting monsters (and planets)... while dancing ... in space :)

There will be more items, cinematics, abilities and more other mechanics still in developement, this is the prototye that you can download and try, suggestions are much appriciated, donations are not expected but also appreciated :)
